publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-4813 Ms Maureen Watt: Congratulations to Aberdeen—That the Parliament congratulates Aberdeen for winning the Beautiful Scotland in Bloom city award for the 39th year in a row and commends the city council workforce and the citizens of Aberdeen for their horticultural efforts.

S2M-4813 Congratulations to Aberdeen (lodged on 19 September 2006) Mrs Nanette Milne*, Brian Adam*, Fergus Ewing*, Alex Johnstone*, Christine Grahame*, Ms Rosemary Byrne*, Bruce Crawford*, Rob Gibson*
S2M-4813 Congratulations to Aberdeen (lodged on 19 September 2006) Robin Harper*, Dave Petrie*, Shiona Baird*

S2M-4813 Ms Maureen Watt: Congratulations to Aberdeen—That the Parliament congratulates Aberdeen for winning the Beautiful Scotland in Bloom city award for the 39th year in a row and commends the city council workforce and the citizens of Aberdeen for their horticultural efforts. Supported by: Mrs Nanette Milne, Brian Adam, Fergus Ewing, Alex Johnstone, Christine Grahame, Ms Rosemary Byrne, Bruce Crawford, Rob Gibson, Robin Harper, Dave Petrie, Shiona Baird, Eleanor Scott*
S2M-4813 Congratulations to Aberdeen (lodged on 19 September 2006) Donald Gorrie*, Roseanna Cunningham*
S2M-4813 Congratulations to Aberdeen (lodged on 19 September 2006) Mr Adam Ingram*
